text: The 2007 Denver mayoral election was held on May 1, 2007. Since John Hickenlooper obtained an absolute majority of the vote in the initial round of voting, no runoff was held. ==Results== {| class=wikitable !colspan=3 | 2007 Denver mayoral election |- !|Candidates !Votes !% |- | John Hickenlooper (incumbent) | align="right" | 68,568 | align="right" | 86.30 |- | Danny F. Lopez | align="right" | 10,053 | align="right" | 12.65 |- | Write-ins | align="right" | 834 | align="right" | 1.05 |- | Total | align="right" | 79,455 | align="right" | 100 |- |} ==References== Denver 2007 Category:Mayoral elections in Denver Category:2007 Colorado elections Category:John Hickenlooper
title: 2007 Denver mayoral election
